messages.content:
Full Script:

**[0‑10 s]**
*On‑screen animation of a pixelated character jumping.*
**Narrator (enthusiastic):** "Ever dreamed of making your own video game? 🎮 Let’s turn that dream into reality!"

**[10‑30 s]**
*Cut to a teen looking frustrated at a messy code editor.*
**Narrator:** "We get it. Learning to code can feel like navigating a boss level with no cheat codes – endless tutorials, confusing jargon, and not enough time after school."

**[30‑55 s]**
*Bright transition to the GameDev Starter Kit logo.*
**Narrator:** "Introducing the **GameDev Starter Kit** – a 6‑week online adventure that teaches you Python the fun way. You’ll get interactive labs, project‑based lessons, and weekly live Q&A sessions with game‑dev pros. And the best part? You’ll end the course with your very own portfolio‑ready game!"

**[55‑85 s]**
*Show snippets of a lab interface, a live Q&A screen, and a student’s game prototype.*
**Narrator:** "Each week, you dive into a hands‑on lab – no boring slides. Build mini‑games, get instant feedback, and ask questions live every Friday. By week five, you’ll be polishing your final project, a game you can share with friends and colleges."

**[85‑100 s]**
*Quick cut to a testimonial video of a happy student.*
**Student (smiling):** "I never thought I could code a game in just six weeks. The labs were super fun, and the live Q&A kept me on track. My final game got 1,200 plays in the first week!"

**[100‑120 s]**
*Call‑to‑action screen with bright button.*
**Narrator:** "Ready to level up? Click the link below, enroll in the GameDev Starter Kit, and start building your own game today! 🎉"

*End with logo and upbeat music.*
